name: Blogroll Dropdown
author: Nguyen Duc Manh

sections.description:
Display links (blogroll) as dropdown select menu with multi option. Visit the blogroll select menu dropdown widget for more information about the plugin or comment it if you want to support. See more features below

Features

The options page allows you to choose from a range of options including:

  • How many links to display
  • Class css for your select box
  • Orderby & Order
  • Display links in list of categories (separated by comma)
  • Include or exclude links
  • Option open in new window or current window
sections.installation:
1. Download the plugin.
  2. Upload it to the plugins folder of your blog.
  3. Goto the Settings –> Appeanrance –> Widget and drag drop Blogroll Dropdown to your sidebar
sections.faq: Please goto my blog http://blog.casanova.vn and comment it. I’ll reply your question
